name: Shopp + Clockwork
author: Lorenzo Orlando Caum, Enzo12 LLC

sections.description:
This plugin integrates Shopp with Clockwork.

This plugin adds text message notifications for new orders.

After checkout, the merchant will receive a text message with new order information.

This process occurs in the background without needing action from the customer.

Recommendations

  • Need help with your Shopp ecommerce store? Hire a Shopp consultant today.
  • View additional WordPress plugins for Shopp by Lorenzo Orlando Caum, Enzo12 LLC
  • Follow Lorenzo on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Quora, and Github

Acknowledgements

Credit to Adam Sewell who wrote the original code that allowed data to be transferred from Shopp after checkout. This code has been extended for several other services.

Credit to Clockwork who created the PHP API Wrapper for the Clockwork API.

Recommended Links

Need a Shopp developer to help you with your Shopp? Hire a Shopp consultant today.

What do you think about video tutorials for Shopp? Web-based lessons and tutorial videos from Shopp 101
sections.installation:
1. You’ll need to have an account with Clockwork
  2. Ensure that your Shopp is activated and up-to-date.
  3. Download Shopp + Clockwork. Unzip the shopp-clockwork folder.
  4. Upload the shopp-clockwork folder to the wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  5. Activate Shopp + Clockwork through the Plugins menu in the WordPress admin.
  6. Go to Shopp 101 → + Clockwork.
  7. Enter your API Key and your Mobile Phone Number including country calling code for Clockwork and click Save Settings.
sections.faq:
How do I get an account with Clockwork?

Visit clockworksms.com to register for an account.

What is Shopp and how do I get it?

Shopp is an ecommerce plugin for WordPress. Learn more about Shopp.

Are there any other extensions available for Shopp?

Yes, there are different extensions available including emailing marketing, short message service (sms) notifications, forms & reporting, help desk, and more. Please visit Shopp 101.
sections.changelog:
1.3

  • Changed name of menu from + Extensions to Shopp 101
  • Verified support for WP 3.9.2
  • Verified support for Shopp 1.3.5
  • Removed links to old domain name
  • Only load CSS on WP admin screen

1.2

  • Moved to new menu

1.0.2

  • Verified support for WordPress 3.5
  • Removed social sharing
  • Verified support for Shopp 1.2.4 and 1.2.5

1.0.1

  • Attempting to correct issue with svn

1.0

  • First version!

short_description: Merchants who have a WordPress e-commerce store are notified of new orders via a text message to their mobile phone through Clockwork.
